description: [Tidepools](http://tidepools.co) is being developed within the [Red Hook Mesh Network](http://oti.newamerica.net/blogposts/2013/case_study_red_hook_initiative_wifi_tidepools-78575), for addressing local, social incentives for mesh use. An Open Source, Collaborative, Mobile Mapping & Social Hub, Reflecting Community Needs & Culture through Custom Apps, Time-based Maps, & Data Feeds.
ohloh_description: Social software for wireless community networks
name: Tidepools
